title: Mexican economy seen growing 3.4% in 2022, says finance ministry - Reuters
content: Mexican economy seen growing 3.4% in 2022, says finance ministry  Reuters
description: Mexico's government forecast economic growth of 3.4% for 2022, far below what the nation's President was aiming for, a finance ministry document showed on Friday, as Latin America's second-largest economy claws back losses from the COVID-19 pandemic.
